meanings.definition: The presence of bacteria in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor detected bacteriurias in the urine sample.
meanings.sent2: It is important to treat bacteriurias to avoid complications.
meanings.sent3: The bacteriurias in the urine were throwing a tiny bacterial party.
meanings.sent4: The bacteriurias in the urine were like a hidden army waiting to attack.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the bacteriurias swimming around in the urine.

meanings.definition: The condition of having bacteria in the urine.
meanings.sent1: Her frequent urinary tract infections led to bacteriurias.
meanings.sent2: The hospital conducted tests to confirm the bacteriurias.
meanings.sent3: The bacteriurias in the urine seemed to be having a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The bacteriurias in the urine were a sign of trouble brewing.
meanings.sent5: The presence of bacteriurias indicated a need for treatment.
